setup_commands: echo 'function fibonacci(n) { return n <= 1 ? n : fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2); } console.log("fib(20) =", fibonacci(20));' > compute.js
echo 'const data = {items: Array.from({length: 100}, (_, i) => ({id: i, value: Math.random()})), total: 100}; console.log(JSON.stringify(data));' > json_gen.js
echo 'const fs = require("fs"); fs.writeFileSync("output.txt", "Hello from Node.js\n"); console.log("File written");' > file_ops.js
